p: The reaction mixture used in the synthesis of AgNPs was optimized by using five different volumes of AECR/CECR (0.1 g extract/mL) to aqueous solutions of AgNO 3 (1 mM) at synthesis ratio 10:90, 20:80, 30:70, 40:60, 50:50, respectively. The addition was performed in a single step. This is because bio-reduction of metal ions usually occur readily in solution, resulting in stable nanoparticles [ 14]. The concentration (10 mL, 0.1 g extract/mL) of AECR/CECR in 90 mL aqueous solutions of AgNO 3 (1 mM) was used, as increased volumes resulted in aggregation of the nanoparticles.
